bill.title: Veterans Mental Health Session Reimbursement Program
bill.description: Concerning a program to provide mental health services for veterans, and, in connection therewith, making an appropriation.

history.action: Introduced In House - Assigned to Public & Behavioral Health & Human Services
House Committee on Public & Behavioral Health & Human Services Refer Amended to Appropriations
House Committee on Appropriations Refer Amended to House Committee of the Whole
House Second Reading Special Order - Passed with Amendments - Committee, Floor
House Third Reading Passed - No Amendments
Introduced In Senate - Assigned to State, Veterans, & Military Affairs
Senate Committee on State, Veterans, & Military Affairs Refer Amended to Appropriations
Senate Committee on Appropriations Refer Amended to Senate Committee of the Whole
Senate Second Reading Special Order - Passed with Amendments - Committee, Floor
Senate Third Reading Passed - No Amendments
House Considered Senate Amendments - Result was to Concur - Repass
Signed by the Speaker of the House
Signed by the President of the Senate

votes.desc: House Public & Behavioral Health & Human Services: Adopt amendment L.001 (Attachment B).
House Public & Behavioral Health & Human Services: Refer House Bill 23-1088, as amended, to the Committee on Appropriations.
House Appropriations: Refer House Bill 23-1088, as amended, to the Committee of the Whole.
Senate State, Veterans, & Military Affairs: Refer House Bill 23-1088, as amended, to the Committee on Appropriations.
Senate Appropriations: Refer House Bill 23-1088, as amended, to the Committee of the Whole.
Senate State, Veterans, & Military Affairs: Adopt amendment L.006 (Attachment C)
Senate State, Veterans, & Military Affairs: Refer House Bill 23-1088, as amended, to the Committee on Appropriations.
